alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:10PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Custer and south central Pennington Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 510 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Farmingdale, or 18 miles southeast of Rapid City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rapid Valley, southeastern Box Elder, New Underwood, Owanka, Caputa, Farmingdale, Folsom, Rapid City Airport, Thompson Butte and Railroad Buttes. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 67 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City
